Text.Name: TESTALL
Text.Desc: Since the beginning of the Thousand-Year Tide, Ancient Cultivators have been popping up all over the place. Gather as much information as possible, there are already multiple sages being born in this world.

Text.Name: Free_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] discovered a place with some nice vistas, put [ITS] artifact away and went to take in the scenery.

Text.Name: Free_1
Text.Desc: [NAME] passed by a small town, felt a bit fatigued and so, putting on the look of a commoner, and stopped by to rest up at the local teahouse.

Text.Name: Free_2
Text.Desc: [NAME] felt a bit tired along the way and decided to take a nap underneath a tree.

Text.Name: Join_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] came across some commoners that had committed themselves to the Tao and so informed the commoners the location of [ITS] School and then headed on.

Text.Name: Kidnap_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] performed a miracle and then Kidnapped a few mortals.

Text.Name: Join_1
Text.Desc: [NAME] discovered an incredibly talented young individual and revealed a miracle to them in their dream, giving an Immortal Destiny to this commoner. If this disciple decides to seek longevity by following the Tao, they will probably arrive at the Order's gate within a day or two.

Text.Name: Join_2
Text.Desc: [NAME] came across a vendetta once every blue moon. Upon seeing a person that was being hunted down and realizing that they their fate seemed to be bound to the School, [NAME] cast a spell to save them and directed them to the School.

Text.Name: Visit_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] came across a group of [SCHOOL]'s disciples that came to greet [ENHIM] while out on the road.

Text.Name: Visit_1
Text.Desc: [NAME] happened upon an elder of [SCHOOL] while walking down the road.

Text.Name: Visit_2
Text.Desc: [NAME] was hurrying along when realized that the mountain school of [SCHOOL] was nearby.
Text.Selections.9.Tip: Primordial Spirit or both parties have to have a good relationship.
Text.Selections.10.Tip: Primordial Spirit state and Luck is high

Text.Name: Story_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] passed by a small city, took on a worldly sentiment and so decided to take on the appearance of a commoner and disappeared on into the city.
Text.Selections.1.Display: Throw the Mortal Realm into disorder

Text.Name: Story_1
Text.Desc: [NAME] noticed there was an old woman polishing an iron rod by the riverside.

Text.Name: Story_2
Text.Desc: [NAME] seemed to be destined to come across this scenic spot suffused with natural beauty. Overcome with awe, [IT] sat down right there and didn't know if it would be possible to have an epiphany.

Text.Name: Story_3
Text.Desc: [NAME] saw two peculiar beasts fighting in the air from time to time. Both beasts seemed to be performing unnatural feats, it was as if it were a battle between beasts from another world. [NAME] was excited and intrigued for it seemed that the battle between these two beasts hid some mystery.

Text.Name: GoodFight_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] passed by a town and discovered that plagues wreak havoc in this place. At the entrance to the city it seems that there are some cultivators helping out the townspeople to control the plague. The situation keeps getting worse though, it seems like they won't be able to control it.

Text.Name: GoodFight_1
Text.Desc: [NAME] sees flashes of light as if off swords in the distance, it would seem that there are people fighting.

Text.Name: BadFight_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] passed by a town and discovered that resentment abounded in this place. It seems like someone is practicing dark arts.

Text.Name: BadFight_1
Text.Desc: [NAME] sees flashes of light as if off swords in the distance, it would seem that there are people fighting.

Text.Name: Treasure_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] inadvertently came across the hidden residence of a cultivator...it seems like it was abandoned quite some time ago.

Text.Name: Treasure_1
Text.Desc: [NAME] hurried on for days on end, and while fatigued, it wasn't until coming across a deep pool of water at dusk that this one decided to rest. During the night, [NAME] was surprised to discover a light seemed to be coming from the water.

Text.Name: Find_Base
Text.Desc: When [NAME] arrived at this place, it turned out that there was a lot around that could be gathered.

Text.Name: City_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] came to [PLACE] and discovered that it was densely populated and business was booming.

Text.Name: Business_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] discovered that this place had a developed market with low prices and so decided to pick things up before heading back.

Text.Name: Highfind_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] heard that there were some items produced in [PLACE] that were useful for one's Practice.

Text.Name: Secret_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] passed by [PLACE] while travelling and discovered that there were a great many people discussing something.

Text.Name: Place_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] heard that there were more than a few terribly interesting places near [PLACE] and so decided to go on an excursion.

Text.Name: Story_Cold
Text.Desc: [NAME] seemed to be destined to come across this scenic spot suffused with natural beauty. Overcome with awe, [IT] sat down right there and didn't know if it would be possible to have an epiphany.

Text.Name: Story_Cold2
Text.Desc: [NAME] saw two peculiar beasts fighting in the air from time to time. Both beasts seemed to be performing unnatural feats, it was as if it were a battle between beasts from another world. [NAME] was excited and intrigued for it seemed that the battle between these two beasts hid some mystery.

Text.Name: Secret_Cold_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] travelled to [PLACE] and [IT] heard that there were juicy rumors abounding here and so tried to see what could be found out.

Text.Name: Place_Cold_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] heard that there were more than a few terribly interesting places near [PLACE] and so decided to go on an excursion.

Text.Name: Find_Cold_Base
Text.Desc: While [NAME] was travelling, it turned out that there was a lot around [PLACE] that could be of use.

Text.Name: Highfind_Cold_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] heard that there were some items produced in [PLACE] that were useful for one's Practice.

Text.Name: Visit_Old_Base
Text.Desc: [NAME] came across a group of [SCHOOL]'s disciples that came to greet [ENHIM] while out on the road.

Text.Name: Visit_Old_1
Text.Desc: [NAME] happened upon an elder of [SCHOOL] while walking down the road.

Text.Name: Visit_Old_2
Text.Desc: [NAME] was hurrying along when realized that the mountain school of [SCHOOL] was nearby.
Text.Selections.5.Tip: Primordial Spirit or both parties have to have a good relationship.
Text.Selections.6.Tip: Primordial Spirit state and Luck is high
